blogPost.excerpt: Mindstamp is the interactive video solution you've been looking for! Add Buttons, Questions, Hotspots, Branching. Use conditional logic and variables to create dynamic, personalized experiences. Capture data from every view. Simple, fast, and easy to use ✌🏼
blogPost.body: Mindstamp is the interactive video solution you've been looking for! Add Buttons, Questions, Hotspots, Branching. Use conditional logic and variables to create dynamic, personalized experiences. Capture data from every view. Simple, fast, and easy to use ✌🏼
blogPost.title: Mindstamp 2.0 - Make any video interactive in seconds 👁
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Mindstamp是您一直在寻找的互动视频解决方案! 添加按钮，问题，热点，分支。使用条件逻辑和变量来创建动态的、个性化的体验。从每个视图中捕捉数据。简单、快速、易于使用✌🏼。
localize.tagline: Jedes Video in Sekundenschnelle interaktiv machen 👁

localize.description: Mindstamp是您一直在尋找的互動視頻解決方案! 添加按鈕，問題，熱點，分支。使用條件邏輯和變量來創建動態的、個性化的體驗。從每個視圖中捕捉數據。簡單、快速、易於使用✌🏼。
localize.tagline: Jedes Video in Sekundenschnelle interaktiv machen 👁

previous.excerpt: Organize all the docs in a way where people can find them. Spaceli allows you to create a knowledge base from your existing Google Docs and folders in a couple of clicks. For you, your team and your users.
previous.title: Spaceli - Turn Google Docs into a knowledge base

localize.description: 将所有的文档整理成人们可以找到的方式。Spaceli允许您从现有的谷歌文档和文件夹中创建一个知识库，只需点击几下。对于你，你的团队和你的用户来说。
localize.tagline: Verwandeln Sie Google Docs in eine Wissensdatenbank

localize.description: 將所有的文檔整理成人們可以找到的方式。Spaceli允許您從現有的谷歌文檔和文件夾中創建一個知識庫，只需點擊幾下。對於你，你的團隊和你的用戶來說。
localize.tagline: Verwandeln Sie Google Docs in eine Wissensdatenbank

next.excerpt: Get the incredibly detailed and most accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch. The library is loaded with hundreds of components, colors, and text styles. Arguably the fastest way to get started with your Mac app designs.
next.title: macOS 11 Big Sur UI Kit - The most detailed and accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch 💎

localize.description: 为Sketch获得令人难以置信的详细和最准确的macOS UI Kit。该库加载了数百种组件、颜色和文本样式。可以说是最快的方式来开始你的Mac应用设计。
localize.tagline: 最详细、最准确的macOS用户界面工具包，适用于Sketch💎。

localize.description: 爲Sketch獲得令人難以置信的詳細和最準確的macOS UI Kit。該庫加載了數百種組件、顏色和文本樣式。可以說是最快的方式來開始你的Mac應用設計。
localize.tagline: 最詳細、最準確的macOS用戶界面工具包，適用於Sketch💎。
